Recent updates in New York include the NYPD's response to a suspicious package at the Staten Island Ferry terminal, a record low in youth tobacco use, and a judge ruling against the state for violating its climate law, alongside various local crime incidents and community developments.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYPD responds to report of suspicious package at Staten Island Ferry terminal in Manhattan. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- N.Y. weather: Chilly temperatures forecast for NYC; frost possible. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
